p: Acrylpiamric acid salts of calcium and zinc are solids. They can be prepared from acrylpimaric acid, sodium hydroxide and calcium chloride or zinc sulfate according to Scheme 36 and using such separation methods as washing, filtration and drying [ 137]. They can be used as a stabilizer of poly(vinyl chloride) showing better thermal stability than commercial Ca/Zn stearate [ 137].
